page.title: 03RIDING FOR THE DISABLED
page.content:
The school is involved in{Riding for {the Disabled}and has set aside Monday, Tuesday and Thursday of each week especially for groups of mentally handicapped children and disabled people to enable them to partake in this recreation.
The school has built up a considerable reputation throughout the area for its work in this field, and many of the handicapped who have been taught to ride at{Millbridge}have gone on to participate in competitions with considerable success.
The children especially enjoy this form of leisure and it is a very popular outdoor pursuit in the area.
